name: One Room, One Roomba.
description:
-----------------------!!HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED!!----------------------- Difficulty: HARD

(doubt you'll beat it, unless you're up for a challenge)

Aim of the game is to suck up the dirt then put it in the bin within the time limit.

Controls:

WASD: Move and turn around (while in air it become a Tilt)

Spacebar: Rocket Boost

E : Deposits dirt into the bin (located in the corner of the room)

F: flips the roomba when you fall onto your back

Credits:

Piano and Game Banner by: https://twitter.com/tanukitim1

The rest of the game, including the theme song located during the start screen: me :P

(all 3d models are my own, apart from the guitar, that's too hard to model lol)

Feel free to follow me on twitter and send me a message! I'd love to make new game dev friends!                   >-      TWITTER   -<
